forumNotes.author: wimb
forumNotes.content:
You can try to add to the \[Data\] section of your winnt.sif file ``` [Data] DriverSigningPolicy=Ignore NonDriverSigningPolicy=Ignore ```
These entries must in any case be present in $WIN_NT$.\~BT\\winnt.sif on USB-stick. You can check that before booting from stick. If the pop-up appears during XP Setup you can also use the \[Enter\] key to confirm, or change active button using \[Tab\] key and then use \[Enter\] key.
